text: 2019 Copa América was the 46th Copa América tournament and it took place in Brazil. The host, Brazil won the tournament. ==Results== ===Group stage=== ====Group A==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 2 1 0 8 0 +8 7 align=left 3 1 2 0 3 1 +2 5 align=left 3 1 1 1 3 6 -3 4 align=left 3 0 0 3 2 9 -7 0 ====Group B==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 3 0 0 4 0 +4 9 align=left 3 1 1 1 3 3 0 4 align=left 3 0 2 1 3 4 -1 2 align=left 3 0 1 2 2 5 -3 1 ====Group C==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 2 1 0 7 2 +5 7 align=left 3 2 0 1 6 2 +4 6 align=left 3 0 2 1 3 7 -4 2 align=left 3 0 1 2 2 7 -5 1 ===Knockout stage=== ==Other websites== *RSSSF Category:Copa América tournaments Category:2019 in association football Category:2019 in Brazil Category:Football in Brazil Category:June 2019 events Category:July 2019 events
